=================

(4) Four Footstools
Get Two (2) Tables FREE
*Plus Delivery

MENU

name: Custom Made To Order Adirondack Foot Rests
description:
MENU
Adirondack chairs ............................$80 each
Adirondack Love Seats....................$150 each
Matching Adirondack Foot Stools......$50 each
Matching Adirondack Tables.............$60 each
More choices coming soon!

I am a local family man with a beautiful wife and bouncing baby boy. God has blessed me with many things including the gift of carpentry - the trade of our Lord. As God's blessings do not include free diapers, I craft these beautiful Adirondack pieces for others to enjoy. Please take a look!
May your day be blessed!

Custom orders require 50% deposit.
Production time varies on size of order.
References Upon Request.

*`*`*DELIVERY AVAILABLE`*`*`*
Within Forsyth County $20
Guildford, Davidson, Davie & Stokes $40
Raleigh/RTP or Charlotte/Mecklenburg $60
Beaches (including Myrtle and Wilmington) $100
Other locations email for quote.
